metadata.title: Kiwi
metadata.description: Platform for building an autonomous learning experience ecosystem

intro.headline:
A Platform for Building an Autonomous
Learning Experience Ecosystem
intro.copy:
We provide a learning experience platform designed to foster empathy and a sense of belonging across your entire community—beyond learning itself.
By delivering connected learning experiences, we enable innovative educational approaches through natural collaboration, and offer Kiwi's flexible and effective management solutions tailored to today's increasingly complex education environments.

studentInformationSystem.title: Student Information System
studentInformationSystem.description: Course registration, grades, and academic administration support

learningManagementSystem.title: Learning Management System
learningManagementSystem.description: Individual course management and learning journey delivery

contentManagementSystem.title: Content Management System
contentManagementSystem.description: Storage and distribution of learning materials and educational content

videoProductionSystem.title: Video Production System
videoProductionSystem.description: Educational video recording & editing tools, AI-powered video creation

communicationSystem.title: Communication System
communicationSystem.description: Messaging and notifications between learners and instructors

collaborationSystem.title: Collaboration System
collaborationSystem.description: Support for shared projects and document collaboration

studentSuccessSystem.title: Student Success System
studentSuccessSystem.description: Personalized advising and support (Major planning, e-Portfolio)

unifiedAuth.title: Unified Authentication & Authorization
unifiedAuth.description: Access all services with a single sign-on

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Data Integration Layer
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Unified management of data across multiple systems

apiGateway.title: API Gateway
apiGateway.description: A secure gateway connecting diverse services and data

learningAnalyticsSystem.title: Learning Analytics System
learningAnalyticsSystem.description: Analyze learning data for personalized recommendations and performance prediction

learningHistoryRepository.title: Learning History Repository
learningHistoryRepository.description: Standardized storage and management of learning data for analytics

featureStore.title: Feature Store
featureStore.description: Store and share data features required for AI analysis

knowledgeGraphEngine.title: Knowledge Graph Engine
knowledgeGraphEngine.description: Search, recommendations, and inference across users, courses, and content

llmServing.title: Large Language Model Serving
llmServing.description: Real-time utilization of large-scale AI models

ragStack.title: RAG Stack
ragStack.description: Enhances the accuracy of knowledge retrieval and AI-generated answers

multimodalAiEngine.title: Multimodal AI Engine
multimodalAiEngine.description: Unified processing of text, audio, images, and video data

mlops.title: MLOps
mlops.description: Automated development, deployment, and monitoring of AI models

analyticsMart.title: Analytics Mart
analyticsMart.description: Aggregates KPIs and metrics to support data-driven decision making

canvas.title: Canvas By Instructure
canvas.description: A leading global LMS used by thousands of universities and educational institutions worldwide, delivered through Korea’s only official licensed partner—ensuring a stable operating environment and professional technical support.

igniteAi.title: Canvas IgniteAI
igniteAi.description: An education-purpose AI co-designed by Instructure and OpenAI, powered by OpenAI technology—intelligently supporting the entire learning workflow, from creating assignments, quizzes, and rubrics to summarizing discussions.

panopto.title: Panopto CMS
panopto.description: A learning video management platform used by universities and enterprises worldwide, enabling efficient storage and utilization of knowledge assets through automatic lecture recording and powerful search capabilities.

zoom.title: Zoom
zoom.description: A video communication service used by hundreds of millions of people worldwide, supporting seamless online classes and meetings.

slack.title: Slack
slack.description: A messaging platform adopted as a standard collaboration tool by global enterprises, strengthening teamwork through real-time communication and seamless file sharing.

notion.title: Notion
notion.description: An all-in-one workspace used by tens of millions worldwide, managing documents, projects, and databases in a single space.

genwave.title: GenWave
genwave.description: A multimodal AI platform that automatically generates various media content including images, videos, music, and text with just keywords or simple sentence input.

diquest.title: diquest e-Portfolio
diquest.description: A service providing career direction and portfolio based on student-centered academic information and comprehensive LMS design.

Our team will get back to you promptly.
